wikipedia_page.main: Arthur Patrick Hastings Forbes, 9th Earl of Granard AFC (1915 – 21 November 1992), was a British peer.

link_mentions.page: List of Légion d'honneur recipients by name (G)

response: He married, firstly, Lady Moira Beatrice Forbes, daughter of Arthur Forbes, 9th Earl of Granard and Marie Madeleine de Faucigny-Lucinge, on 7 October 1971 and were divorced in 1975.
********** Arthur Forbes, 9th Earl of Granard (1915-1992) ∞ Marie-Madeleine Eugenie, Princess of Faucigny Lucinge (d. 1990)
*Arthur Forbes, 9th Earl of Granard (1915–1992), British peer

The airfield, code EICS, was constructed in 1975 on the estate with a 1275 metre grass runway by Arthur Forbes, 9th Earl of Granard for the use of himself and invited friends.  Following his death in 1992 the airfield's licence was revoked and it closed.
